component.name: Tauno Serial Plotter
component.summary: Simple serial plotter for Arduino and others similar devices.

description.p: Tauno-Serial-Plotter is simple serial plotter for Arduino and similar others.

ul.li: Plotting of multiple variables, with different colors for each
Can plot both integers and floats

description.p: Incoming serial data should be string. Ending with new line character. Numbers (int and float) can be separated with almost any character. Like: "label2la15be17el28/31/42/54 78\n" or "a2b1.5c1.7d2.8/3.1/4.2/5.4 7.8\n". But not with - unless it is a negative number: "-10\"
